name: Restaurant Empire II
summary: The sequel to the widely popular Restaurant Empire game takes you further into the depths and delights of the culinary universe than ever before. Take part in an exciting world where the customers are fickle and the bounty in your cash register changes as quickly as their tastes. With two handfuls of cash and a dream of stamping a legacy, build, cook and hire your way to the very top of the gastronomic biz, where tasty food is king and smart management reels in the cash. And if you're lucky, you just may go further than any other before you and cement your status as a true legend of cuisine...

esrb.synopsis: This is a simulation game in which players assume the role of an up-and-coming restaurant manager. Players can oversee food preparation, monitor finances, and customize many aspects of their restaurant (e.g., décor and menu selection). Alcoholic beverages can be included on the menu, and customers can sometimes be seen drinking wine, beer, and cognac at their tables. Players also have the ability to monitor their restaurant from a top-down perspective. This includes a view of customers who enter the restroom, sit on toilets, and commence a "wiping action." During the course of the game, players will interact with colorful characters, including a businessman who often holds a cigar.

pegi.synopsis: The content of this game is suitable for all persons.
